name: Pucca's Race for Kisses
overview: Step into the super-fast shoes of Pucca on her relentless mission to win Garu’s affections. Freeze time using the Wii Remote, then restart the action to leap obstacles and defeat enemies in your path, while picking up items, weapons or tools to help you on your way. If you succeed in grabbing Garu, each episode will end with a wild kissing scene to remember! The game is playable in English, Spanish, German, Italian, French, Dutch, Portuguese, Danish, Finnish, Norwegian or Swedish.
